title: Diff-Ensembler: Learning to Ensemble 2D Diffusion Models for Volume-to-Volume Medical Image Translation

abstract: Despite success in volume-to-volume translations in medical images, most existing models struggle to effectively capture the inherent volumetric distribution using 3D representations. The current state-of-the-art approach combines multiple 2D-based …

title: Head CT Scan Motion Artifact Correction via Diffusion-Based Generative Models
details: ZM Chen, SQY Tivnan, QRS Li, R Gupta, DN Wu - … , AMAI 2024, Held in Conjunction with …
abstract: Head motion is a major source of image artifacts in head computed tomography (CT), degrading the image quality and impacting diagnosis. Imagedomain-based motion correction is practical for routine use since it doesn't rely on hard-to-obtain CT …
